name: Get Noticed: Horizontal Subscribe Form
author: David Kryzaniak

sections.description:
Adds a horizontal subscription signup to the top of every page. Requires the Get Noticed! Theme (tested with 1.1.2).

Please note, version 1.0.1 of this plugin only supports MailChimp. Additional service support (aweber,
constantcontact, etc.) is coming soon.

This plugin is not associated with “Get Noticed!”, Andrew Buckman, Michael Hyatt, or anyone else from the “Get Noticed!”
theme. If you have questions, please contact me directly at (https://davekz.com/connect/)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Zip, Or install from the WordPress Admin Area
  2. Go to Appearance > GNT: Horizontal Subscribe
  3. Configure settings and save
  4. Check to make sure everything is working!
